generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with multiple lanes, markings, and vehicles, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: The sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, with a pedestrian walking on it.
- building: There are several buildings visible on both sides of the street, including modern glass buildings and older structures.
- vegetation: Trees and hedges are visible along the sides of the road and on the building facades.
- terrain: Grass and fallen leaves are visible on the sidewalk and along the roadside.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a black car on the left and white cars further ahead.
- truck: A white truck is visible in the distance on the road.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible, including a directional sign indicating 200 meters ahead and a yellow diamond-shaped warning sign.
- pole: Poles are visible supporting traffic signs and other infrastructure along the sidewalk.
- fence: A fence is visible on the right side of the road, near the building.
